content: Great point <@941196169852366859>  - I created a thread here for raising awareness of this issue. ðŸ™‚
For suggestion thread: Pls tell campaign website people they have got to make the font bigger on the new way forward section  hard to Read or print.

Instructions: To activate Zoom on Windows device.  Window Key ++ or -- to reverse, To print once the screen is enlarged, right click to save or print  the web page portion as a PDF or you can screen shot the portion Win Shift S and then print that enlarged text.

I wanted to second <@941196169852366859> on the topic of screen captures and alt text. It is standard accessibility practice for any text that appears in an image to be included in alt text, because alt text is essential for screen readers. Not providing this functionality could be a violation of Section 508 guidelines. 
https://www.section508.gov/create/alternative-text/

I never thought much about that, but you brought up a good point, Jen. I mostly thought about it because while I'm not blind, I do have a disability, so I understand the needs of the community. Also, like I said, I had a friend in college who was legally blind, and she told me this a few years back.
<@941196169852366859> and <@580183624062730241> - Did y'all see there is a disability community event in <#1268426751164551199>?
